page.title: 18A North Shropshire Ramble
page.content: We came to a foot bridge over the river Morda.This river was quite deep and had small brown fish in it.We walked up a lane and turned right where there was a postbox and a couple of houses.We passed the houses and came to a small wood.The trees arched over the road.A five feet tall hedge grew along the sides of the road obscuring the view.There was a picturesque black and white house with pine doors called The Croft.We came to the village hall and a disused chapel.It still had an old organ and a piano in it.At last we reached our destination and rested in the shade of Saint John's Church .
